segments.text: This kitchen is a disaster waiting to happen, and it's quite disheartening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The amount of water gushing out of that sink is truly wasteful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's just pooling on the floor, soaking into the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost feel the dampness and imagine the eventual water damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of mold and rot forming under there just makes me shudder.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the woman, she's so utterly disconnected from her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's oblivious to the mess and the children's antics.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children, of course, are taking advantage of the situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're raiding the cookie jar, and that wobbly stool is a hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a sad display of neglect and potential accidents.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This lack of awareness for one's immediate environment is troubling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really wish someone would just turn off that faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene leaves a rather sour taste in my mouth.
segments.speaker: PAR
